entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 12:01 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
